Arthur Kriticos.action: Shares a last look with Maggie before following Rafkin out of the library.

Arthur Kriticos.action: Pleading with the ghost Cyrus to help save his kids.

Arthur Kriticos.action: Arthur wrestles with the decision to jump into the Ocularis to stop the deadly mechanism threatening his kids.

Arthur Kriticos.action: Says 'Take care of each other...' to his family before facing danger.

Arthur Kriticos.action: Feels deep remorse and a desire to redeem himself for Jean.

Arthur Kriticos.action: Carefully observes the ghosts and the symbols, showing thoughtful engagement with his situation.

Arthur Kriticos.action: Arthur takes a long, careful look around the dangerous environment, noting the ghosts, the swirling blades, and the mechanical purgatory of the Eye of Hell.
